title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-9.3 - School allocation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 145-9.3 - School allocation

State Regulations
(a) Scholarships for academic excellence shall be allocated to each high school in
the State on the basis of the procedure prescribed in paragraph (b) of
subdivision 1 of section
605-a
of the

Education Law. (b) If the number of
scholarships allocated to a high school is larger than the number of students
who meet the requirements for selection as a scholarship nominee, pursuant to
the selection criteria set forth in section
145-9.5
of this Subpart, such
excess number of scholarships shall lapse. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
145-9.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
